welcome.slogan: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans
welcome.author: Our motto
welcome.title: Welcome to Your Task Scheduler!
welcome.subtitle: We will plan your life so that you will have no time to die
welcome.text: Are you failing at anything? Is everything getting out of hand? Is the frantic pace of city life literally ruining your plans? Introducing PMA! PMA is a unique, innovative development developed by developers from different countries. This application is based on a simple idea: schedule a workflow with PMA fast quality free. To achieve this goal, a modern organization strategy, Kanban, which has managed to fall in love with billions of citizens of our country, has been introduced into the core of this platform. You no longer have to suffer from your own disorganization and disorder. Wanted buy a ticket for Airsales in Moscow cheap? Enter this task in the table and enjoy!
welcome.adv_text1: Our friendly team consists of people from different countries. Each of us has our own view of the planning process, based on the characteristics of our culture. Before uniting, and in order to unite, we first strongly and definitely disengaged. The result is in front of you.
welcome.adv_text2: Working for free is our thing. For almost a year now, we have been working in this mode. During this time, we have produced many different software products, and we have not received a penny for any of them. This application is no exception. And, frankly, we love it.

carusel.pointer: Here they are, from left to right:
carusel.about1: He always planned life, and she always methodically destroyed his plans.
carusel.about2: Once he planned to become a nice fellow, but he became just an old man.
carusel.about3: He once planned to complete this project, but gave up before he started.
